title: In the market
initialText:
Inside, you see a door with a lock, a bartender serving dark clouded beer in the bar next door, and a stray dog that is kinda looking at you.
You:

decisions.result: Okay, maybe this key will be of use...
Maybe he can explain me what is this place. Or at least confuse me even more with a drink.
Why are you looking at me like that, buddy?
